name: Abracket Pvt Ltd
description:
For businesses seeking seamless customer engagement and streamlined operations, our WhatsApp Integrated Customer Engagement Platform offers:
-- Broadcasting
-- Lead Interaction
-- Automated Processes with Chatbots, Triggers, and Events
-- WhatsApp Catalog for showcasing Products

-- Direct Order Management, all accessible and manageable from your phone.
focus_areas: Customer Engagement Platform with Process Automation.
Providing Comprehensive Solutions integrated with WhatsApp Cloud API, facilitating end-to-end business processes
